data.title: Meet Adam Wainwright's wife, Jenny Curry, and their children
data.meta_description: Who is Adam Wainwright's wife? And how long has she stayed married to Adam? Get the top interesting details about the renowned baseball player's wife here.
data.text:
It's not shocking to hear celebrities breaking up yearly or even after a few months together. However, finding inspiring celebrities' love stories is also not hard. Take, for instance, Adam Wainwright and Jenny Curry, a celebrity couple that began dating while in high school and whose commitment hasn't seemed to waver even after 19 years of marriage. But who is Adam Wainwright's wife?

Jenny Curry and Adam Wainwright are among the most recognized celebrity couples, proving two people can grow together. Even after 19 years of marriage, the couple has continuously shown immense love for each other. How much do you know about Adam Wainwright's wife?

Jenny Curry's profile summary

Full nameJenny CurryNicknameJennyGenderFemaleAge 40Date of Birth 1983Birth Place Brunswick, GeorgiaNationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteReligion ChristianHeight in ft5 feet 5 inchesWeight in kgs55 kgSexualityAmericanSexualityStraightHigh schoolGlynn AcademyUniversityGeorgia Southern UniversityOccupationInterior DesignerEye ColourBlueHair ColourBrownMarital statusMarriedHusbandAdam Wainwright(m.2004)Children5 (four daughters and one son)

Adam is the proud son of Bill and Nancy Wainwright and the youngest brother of Trey Wainwright. He is a baseball player who entered MLB on 11th Sep 2005. He was born on 30th Aug 1981 in Brunswick, GA.

Who is Adam Wainwright's wife?

Jenny Curry is Adam Wainwright's wife as of 2023. She is a 40-year-old interior designer. The American hails from Brunswick, Georgia, which is also her birthplace. She was born in 1983 but has yet to reveal the date in the public domain.

The designer studied at Glynn Academy, where she also met Adam. After graduating high school, Jenny enrolled in Georgia Southern University, where she studied and earned her Bachelor's degree in Interior design.

It's now more than two decades since Jenny Curry and Wainwright met in their mutual high school, Glynn Academy. They dated for over four years and married in 2004. Since then, the pair have grown together.

The couple does not shy away when portraying their love and support for each other. While Adam is a baseball pitcher, Adam Wainwright's spouse is an interior designer professionally. However, Jenny took a rest from her job to care for and raise their children.

How many children does Jenny Curry have?

Adam Wainwright and Jenny Curry are blessed with five children. Jenny is a mother of four daughters and a son. Her daughters are:

Baylie Grace (born on 16th Sep 2006)

Morgan Addison (born 2008)

Macy Wainwright (born in 2011)

Sadee Faith (born in 2015)

Did Adam Wainwright and Jenny Curry adopt a child? Yes. After 15 years of marriage with four daughters, the couple adopted a son named Caleb in April 2019. They decided to adopt after feeling like their family was not complete. The baseball player and his wife began the adoption process in 2018.

While working with an adoption agency, the family went through interviews and was matched with their newborn baby boy in January 2019. They named him Caleb Adam Wainwright. Caleb was born in February 2019 and came home with his new parents on 16 April 2019.

Wainwright has spoken openly about his decision to adopt, saying that he believes adoption is a beautiful thing of giving a child a loving home. He hopes to inspire others to consider adoption. Adam Wainwright's family is close-knit and often seen together in baseball games.

How much is Jenny Curry worth?

As of 2023, Jenny. Curry's net worth is estimated at $500k. She created her wealth from an interior designing career, but details about her salary are unavailable on public domains. She has also not revealed the details about her properties, like the model of cars she has and how much they cost.

Jenny's net worth is just a fraction of what her husband is worth. Adam Wainwright's net worth is approximately $55 million. His primary source of income is his 18 years of playing baseball.

Jenny curry's fast facts

Who is Adam Wainwright married to? Adam Wainwright is married to Jenny Curry.

What does Jenny Curry do for a living? Jenny Curry is an interior designer who took a rest to raise her children.

How many children do Jenny Curry and Adam Wainwright have? Jenny Curry and her husband have five childrenâ€“ four daughters and one son.

Did Adam Wainwright adopt a son? Adam Wainwright and his wife adopted a son they brought home in 2019 and named him Caled Adam Wainwright.

When did Adam Wainwright and Jenny Curry get married? Jenny Curry and Adam Wainwright married in 2004. They have been happily married for 19 years(as of 2023).

How old is Jenny Curry? Jenny Curry is 40 years old. She was born in 1983.

When did Adam and Jenny Curry meet? Jenny Curry and Adam met in their high school days at Glynn Academy.

Adam Wainwright's wife - Final word

Jenny Curry and Adam Wainwright are committed couples who prove that celebrity marriages work. While you may not know much about Adam Wainwright's wife, there's no denying that she has greatly supported her husband toward his professional success.

Tuko.co.ke published an interesting article about Isabella Aurora Lloyd Webber. She is an English entrepreneur and creative director. She is the lastborn daughter of Andrew Lloyd Webber, an English composer and musical theatre impresario.

Isabella studied graphic design and has worked for several companies. She runs Bella Webber, a company she founded in 2021. Isabella has previously collaborated with Sony Music Entertainment and BeHookd Digital.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
